function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced attachment to public places due to prolonged absence during lockdown.","Impact":"Loss of connection to community and public spaces, potential increase in online isolation.","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate safe and gradual return to public spaces, promote community engagement and social activities.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, public health guidelines for safe gatherings.","People":"Children, youth, and individuals who have experienced prolonged lockdown.","Owner":"Community organizations, local governments, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Changes in perceptions of public spaces correlated with COVID-19 impact, lockdown severity, and economic impact.","Impact":"Unequal effects on individuals' perceptions and attachment to public places, potential increase in disparities.","Mitigation":"Support mental health services and community programs, address economic disparities and provide resources for rebuilding community attachment.","Technologies":"Telehealth, community support apps, economic relief programs.","People":"Individuals affected by COVID-19 impact, lockdown measures, and economic challenges.","Owner":"Health organizations, local governments, and community support agencies."},{"Description":"Inequities and exclusions in access to public spaces due to pandemic-related restrictions.","Impact":"Increased perceptions of insecurity, limited access to public spaces, and potential rise in inequality.","Mitigation":"Address systemic inequalities, improve safety measures, and promote inclusive access to public spaces.","Technologies":"Surveillance and safety technologies, community engagement platforms, accessibility enhancements.","People":"Communities affected by economic and security challenges, particularly in Latin American cities.","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, and public safety agencies."}]}
